weight: - 480 g - 530 g (with battery and memory card)
isosensitivity: ISO 100 to 12800 in steps of 1/3 EV. Can also be set to approx. 0.3, 0.7, or 1 EV (ISO 25600 equivalent) above ISO 12800; auto ISO sensitivity control available
accessoriesincluded: - EN-EL14a rechargeable Li-ion battery - MH-24 battery charger - DK-5 eyepiece cap - DK-25 rubber eyecup - UC-E17 USB cable - EG-CP16 audio video cable - AN-DC3 camera strap - BF-1B body cap - BS-1 accessory shoe cover
cleaning: - Image sensor cleaning - Image Dust Off reference data
dimensions: 125 x 98 x 76 mm (W x H x D)
